name: Nothing Ventured (Redslash12)
description:
~Nothing Ventured~

Developed in 96 hours for Global Gam Jam '21. Special thanks to the PIGSquad community and volunteers!

Dive into an ancient temple and explore its depths! A short single player exploration platforming game. Supports keyboard and mouse or controller.

Controls (Controller Recommended):
WASD: A,D: Move, Mouse: Look, Space: Jump, Esc: Menu
Arrows:  Up/Down/Left/Right: Move/Look, X/Space/Num-0: Jump, Enter/Z: Menu
Controller (a): Left Stick: Move, Right Stick: Look, Face/Shoulder Buttons: Jump, Start/Select: Menu
Controller (b): D-Pad: Move/Look, Triggers: Change Direction,  Face/Shoulder Buttons: Jump, Start/Select: Menu

V1.1 (2/1/21) Changelog:
Fixed menu not working in all levels
Fixed incorrect tiles and collision
Added additional control maps 
Fixed Flashlight-Raves

Current Bugs: 
Audio may not work on mac in web build, will make MacOS build
Moving the cursor between the player and the flashlight causes flashlight to point backwards (Not going to fix as this was the compromise for fixing flashlight raves)
No controller support for Menu
